definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: terebinth (prob. as prominent, lofty tree, v. Di Ge 12:6, Ge 14:6)—cstr. [[אֵיל]] only n.pr. [[אֵיל פָּארָן]] vid. infr.; pl. [[אֵילִים]] Is 1:29; [[אֵלִים]] Is 57:5 cstr. [[אֵילֵי]] Is 61:3; sf. [[אֵלֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 31:14 (> del. Co. vid. Vulgate U).—terebinth (cf. [[אֵלָה]]); as marking idol-shrines Is 1:29, Is 57:5 (so Che Di etc. > gods); fig. of ransomed ones of Zion [[אֵילֵי הַצֶּדֶק]]; perh. of haughty ones Ez Eze 31:14.
